dialogues.DUKE:
[1]The hell's wrong with you, Stalworth, you didn't eat that Chicken A La King at chow did ya? 
[2]What about it? Another day, another run. 
[3]You're off the mission. 
[4]That's what you want, right? Stalworth doesn't argue. Duke hands him back the photo. 
[5]If your head's with them, you're no good to me. Stalworth nods. Duke steps closer, now one mean s.o.b. 
[6]One thing, though: you step off this one, you're out of Special Forces. Gonna find you a nice desk and chair back at the base. You're be run of the mill. Regular. 
[7]Then you should. Stalworth nods, grabs his kit, and leaves. Duke's hard eyes watch him go, then a slight smile creases his lips ... 
[8]All right, listen up, the Cougars will be front and back, Grizzly in the middle carrying the package. Minimum distance at all times. Choppers will cover us overhead. The Lab Workers step up. 
[9]--We have our orders. Okay, people! We're on the clock, let's move. 
[10]Mother Goose, this is Bird Dog. We have the package and are on the dot to make Ganci Air Base ar 0900. 
[11]Not me, I joined up for the jargon. 
[12]Rip, if you ran the Army we'd stay up all night, fill our canteen with tequila, and call each other "Bro". 
[13]Yeah, we'd be badasses. Eyes on the road, Rip. 
[14]Keep your eyes on the road, Rip. 
[15]Don't listen to 'em. you got plenty of thoughts up there.  Keep rear security tight, boys.     11. 
[16]Please don't say the Air Forces. 
[17]I thought we were done with that discussion. 
[18]I don't think your daddy's crop duster counts as hours logged. 
[19]Yeah, yeah, look, you want to get up in the air, we'll get you a trampoline back at the base. 
[20]This continues to be the stupidest idea you've ever come up with, nd that's saying something. 
[21]I don't wanna transfer to the Air Force, okay? 
[22]I want to be in the fight, not flying over it. 
[23]--Eyes on the road, Rip. 
[24]Back up! Back up! Back up!  Mother Goose, this is Bird Dog. We are under attack. Repeat --we are under attack! 
[25]Out! Everyone get out of the vehicles! Now! 
[26]You okay? 
[27]Shut up. 
[28]You're not gonna die. 
[29]Jesus, Rip. 
[30]Stay here. 
[31]I'm gettin' that package. Duke leaps up and hauls-ass down the ditch, then crouch-runs up the embankment. --And comes face to face with a Viper, who raises his pulse rifle, about to blow Duke away. A hand clamps down over the barrel. The Viper looks at Ana beside him. Duke also looks at her, a flash of shocking recognition ripples across his face.     16. Ana touches the stem of her glasses and the DARK LENSES turn clear, revealing her gorgeous eyes. 
[32]What the hell...? Her face softens hesitantly. 
[33]Air Force.. .right.     17. A Viper lines up on Duke, but a laser-like ARROW BOLT rips through his eye-slit and ELECTROCUTES him, courtesy of SHANA "SCARLETT" O'HARA who fast-ropes down from the Howler, holding a gas-propulsion CROSSBOW PISTOL. She lines up on another Viper, but he's too quick, ducks behind the GRIZZLY. But Scarlett's CROSSBOW PISTOL viewfinder snapped an image of his FACE ARMOR. She darts behind the COUGAR WRECK with Snake- Eyes, swiftly targeting the Viper's eye-slit on her pistol's LED SCREEN. Then she fires behind her, in the complete other direction to the Viper, the arrow bolt flies away, then turns around and zeroes in on the Viper, finding him behind cover, the smart-arrow slams right through his eye-slit. Another Viper sees this and bolts toward the Typhoon, but LAMONT "HEAVY DUTY" MORRIS leans out of the landing Howler holding a dual MACHINE GUN/GRENADE LAUNCHER. Only a man this big can carry such a weapon. 
[34]Ana! She whirls around, drawing the weapons case over her chest and face, using it as a shield. Duke hesitates, because of the warheads or Ana? Heavy Duty goes to shoot at her. 
[35]Stand down! Stand the hell down! 
[36]Pointing weapons at me doesn't make you my friend. ABEL "BREAKER" SHAZ jumps out of the Howler wearing a computerized SURVEILLANCE SUIT, a French/Tunisian ACCENT: 
[37]I don't know who you are, and I sure as hell don't know who they are, and until I find out, I'm not lowering anything or handling anything over. CLICK-CLACK. They turn to see Ripcord shouldering a rifle. 
[38].you first.     19. 
[39]Those aren't the words that come to mind just now. We weren't told about any support for this mission, so you better tell your team to stand down. Ripcord eyes his sight. 
[40]General hawk. Afghanistan, NATO Forward Command... Breaker sees his chance and gingerly steps up to Duke and starts sweeping a scanner across the case. Hawk smiles. 
[41]No way. I signed for 'em. My mission, my package. I carry them, I deliver them. Breaker's scanner BEEPS. He keys a button. The BEEPING promptly stops. He throws a look at Duke. 
[42]Fine. But you seem to be a little short on transportation a the moment. Team Alpha will deliver you to me. 
[43]And where exactly are you, General? 
[44]What kind of outfit is this? Not regular Army based on the accents.  I have you as an Aussie...  And you're a Johannesburger...  And you: French North Africa. Algiers? 
[45]But somehow you're all in the same unit. One you can't tell me the name of right? 
[46]--You're gonna go after them aren't you? The ones that hit my convoy.  Then whoever you are, whatever this unit is, I want in. 
[47]General. 
[48]I was never asked to join any Op group. 
[49]Vaguely. 
[50]This doesn't look like any Tac Op I've ever seen. Where are we? 
[51]I've never seen combat gear this sleek, what's the trick? 
[52]So who hit us out there? 
[53]My team did everything we could out there. A lot of good men went down-- 
[54]That mission was classified, sir. Clearly, somebody sold us out.     27. 
[55].what happened to her? For once, Ripcord doesn't know what to say. Cover Girl walks in and hands a document to Hawk, who looks through it. 
[56]When you move it, she's gonna come after you, you know that, right?  And with her Intel, and her toys... she'll find you. 
[57]You're going to go after her first. And I want to help. 
[58]You scouted me four years ago, now I'm ready. Let's have at it.     36. 
[59]I know her. 
[60]You said knowing is half the battle. Well, I know who she is. Duke reaches into his pocket, pulls out a photo and shows Hawk. INSERT PHOTO: Ana, four years earlier, much softer looking, staring lovingly at Duke as they're about to kiss. 
[61]Her name is Ana Lewis, and I can tell you everything you need to know about her until... four years ago. After that, well, obviously sa lot's changed. Hawk just stares in disbelief. 
[62]If I had to. 
[63]I can.  I signed on to deliver those warheads, General, and despite your present authority, I want to finish the job. Hawk regards him for a moment. 
[64]Okay, I'll start right here: I hope that vault is tight, because she always gets what she wants... 
[65]I've been wanting to do this before we deploy. 
[66]Only time I'm buying one of these, so why not? They stare a each other, a touching beat. Then Duke screws up his face, worried? 
[67]Well, what do you say? She's too emotional to speak. And then they hear: 
[68]Thanks for killing the mood, Rex. 
[69]We go at oh-five hundred.     41. 
[70]Ana, we can't-- 
[71]Speaking of classified information, you still haven't answered. 
[72]I promise. She smiles and holds out her hand. He threads the ring onto her trembling finger. Rex smiles, but in his eyes is a glint of instability. Ripcord comes CRASHING OUT through shuttered doors and sprawls out next to them, arms and legs akimbo. 
[73]Jesus, Rip. Ripcord rolls over and yells back through the doors: 
[74]I'm done proposing.     42. 
[75]What's the record? 
[76]C'mon, Rip. Ripcord tries harder, genuinely doing his best. But Scarlett us too fast. Ducking and weaving around Ripcord, as nimble as a cat. Five more shots miss her. And now Ripcord's feeling the pressure. He waits for her to move. Fires. She leaps up onto a corner wall and the bolt passes underneath. He fires again as she lands, ducks under it and rolls up to him. He fires his last bolt point blank. She catches it in her left hand by the stem as it leaves the chamber. Slamming her body up against his. Right hand behind his head, left hand holding the bolt. Their faces close. Lips closer. Ripcord's eyes on hers as he whispers: 
[77]Again. They go at each other, fast and furious, the electrified pugil sticks crackling and sparking. Duke spins and attempts a stroke similar to Snake-Eyes' earlier move. Snake-Eyes blocks it, drops, and sweeps Duke's feet, taking him down hard before finishing him with another SPARKING HIT. Again, the Joes react. Snake-Eyes turns away. Duke shakes it off and pops to his feet once more. 
[78]Again.     47. Snake-Eyes nods, a little more respect in his eyes now. This time after the high blows are parried, Snake-Eyes tries the sweep. Duke jumps it, rolls, comes up behind Snake-Eyes and STRIKES. Snake-Eyes barely blocks it. They trade half a dozen blows, the electricity popping and crackling before Snake-Eyes tries a finishing blow. Duke stuffs it with his stick and tackles Snake-Eyes. They fall to the ground, both receiving JOLTS. They go eye-to-eye. It wasn't pretty, but Duke is getting effective. Snake-Eyes pops to his feet. This time he offers a hand to pull Duke up. Across the room, Hawk watches with approval. 
[79]You like her, I get it already. 
[80]Really firing on all cylinders there, Rip. 
[81]The warheads. They all rush out of the doors. Breaker stops to change a chess piece on the board before racing out. 
[82]They can't be far.     53. 
[83]Put the case down, Ana, Rip trains his gun on Storm Shadow. 
[84]Stop, Ana. Stop right there. But she doesn't. She just keeps slowly moving toward him. 
[85]I will if I have to. 
[86]Don't force this, Ana.     54. 
[87]Don't make me do this god-damnit! 
[88]Move and I'll blow her away.  Get the briefcase. Ana takes another step forward, daring Duke to pull the trigger. Ripcord, gun drawn and fixed on Storm Shadow, moves slowly forward to retrieve the briefcase. Ana is now an inch from the extended barrel. Ana and Duke are close enough to feel each other's breath. Their eyes lock. 
[89]Graveyard dead.     63. 
[90]Like what? 
[91]Mind control? 
[92]Their weaponry, financing, intel, it has to be McCullen. Doing an inside job on his own warheads. 
[93]And who says you're not a thinker. All of the sudden, Breaker rushes up to them, out of breath. 
[94]Yeah, you found her all right. 
[95]Who is he? 
[96]That's where she's going. 
[97]Per the briefing, we fast rope in, form up and assault the main lab...  Rex--uh, .the science officer, stays back with Fireteam Alpha until Bravo enters and secures the building. Alpha holds the perimeter while science officer secures the WMDs. Five minutes before extraction and the airstrike. The squad nods. Duke looks to Rex again. Rex is sweating, trying not to show it. Duke hands him a piece of gum.     66. 
[98]Double Bubble? Rex takes it. Duke blows a bubble, smiles at Rex. 
[99]Always helps me. You good? 
[100]Go, Bravo. Bravo, a TWO-MAN fire team hit the door of the building. They disappear inside. Rex, a kit bag over his shoulder and a .45 Colt ACP on his hip, waits in a crouch, Duke next to him puts a hand on his shoulder. Duke scans the treeline for any treats. One of Bravo Team appears in the doorway and signals "ALL CLEAR." Duke double taps Rex on the shoulder. 
[101]You're good to go, Rex. You don't find it in four minutes, get out of there, because that house won't be standing in five. I already called for the air strike. Rex nods. Duke gives him a smile. Rex takes off and runs low to the door, entering the house. Duke watches him go, then looks back to the jungle and hears the WHUMP of mortars. Duke takes one more look, Rex disappears safely inside, then the mortar rounds start to hit. The ground is torn apart, dirt flying in the air, as Duke, Rip and the rest of the squad takes cover. We catch glimpses of the enemy, lots of them, in the jungle, firing. Duke and Ripcord pop up and return fire.     67. 
[102]I hate it when you level with me. 
[103]No, no, no... It's too soon. ANGLE ON: The F-16s in formation streaking toward them across the sky. Duke looks back at the main building. 
[104]Rex. Duke runs for the building. Tracer fire and mortar explosions all around him. Then the whistle of a bunker buster. Duke dives and BOOM! The building is flattened by the bomb. Duke is tossed through the air like a rag doll. Lands hard, barely registers the pain, staggers up, bloody and ripped, stumbles toward the smoking. Flaming rubble that was the building. The Blackhawk comes sweeping low, ready for extraction, the tracer fire and explosions intensify. Black smoke washes over Duke. Ripcord finds him in the debris. 
[105]I can't. 
[106]Yeah, we're working on it.     76. 
[107]What happened to you? 
[108]I jumped over it. 
[109]Yeah, you didn't know? INSIDE THE SCARAB: We see the Neo-Vipers are dead. Storm Shadow is incredibly beat and bloody, but Ana is just fine in her red Accelerator Suit. Storm Shadow grabs the weapons case and he and Ana leap out. Duke and Ripcord pick themselves up while Snake-Eyes crawls out of the TRASH CANS nearby. They see Storm Shadow and Ana emerge from the Scarab and hurry off towards the tower. 
[110]C'mon! Snake-Eyes follows Duke and Ripcord, charging after them. 
[111]Each warhead has a kill switch. 
[112]Those nano-mites will level the entire city! Duke climbs up the side of the tower with his Accelerator Suit. Rip things about following, but then looks at the little girl in his arms, who smiles and hugs him. Snake-Eyes grabs him and they join the flow of people down the stairs. The NANO-MITES chasing them close behind. Below them, Scarlett, Breaker, and Heavy Duty are helping the police evacuate the Tower. INSIDE THE ELEVATOR: Ana and Storm Shadow race to the top. 
[113]Why don't you? 
[114]James? 
[115]Ana listen-- 
[116]Loosen these, he'll never taser anything again. She taps the bonds on his wrists.     87. 
[117]Let me get this straight. You're with McCullen. You're married to that Baron. And you claim you're still in love with me. 
[118]Maybe you just don't know who you are anymore. 
[119]No, this isn't you, I still see the person I loved behind your eyes. Her eyes soften for a moment. 
[120]She was smart, and funny. She was loyal as hell. She loved those she was close with, me, her brother...  I did my best. With Rex. I'm sorry. He was my responsibility. I should have... It's why I left, Ana. Why I couldn't be with you. You were in so much pain... I thought the sight of me just give you more. She seems to be affected by this ever so slightly, then... a hard, cold look comes to her eyes, she shakes her head. 
[121]No, it matters very much. We have the chance to make things right.     88. 
[122]I'm already happy. McCullen glances at Ana, watching the display with conflicted eyes. McCullen heads for the door, beckoning the Neo-Vipers to make Duke follow him. 
[123]What're you gonna do with the warheads? 
[124]Then you won't mind telling me. 
[125]Millions of people are gonna die if you launch those warheads. What is it you want, McCullen?     92. 
[126]Who are you? 
[127]Rex... Rex immediately has trouble breathing and returns the mask over his face. 
[128]You sonuvabitch... Ana buried you. 
[129]Why? .Why didn't you come in...? 
[130]Does Ana know about this, about you? 
[131]You sick bastard... you did this to your own sister? 
[132]Why work for McCullen? 
[133]That's bullshit. You could have had any job you wanted. 
[134]Everything she's done, everything she's become, started because she thought you died that day. 
[135]Ana! Duke looks over to see the Doctor holding his PDA, McCullen and two Neo-Vipers beside him, their rifles on Duke and Ana. Duke gazes at Ana, desperately feeling for her pulse. 
[136]Put it down. 
[137]Put it down! The Doctor doesn't move. McCullen watches the stand-off his right hand discreetly drawing STEEL HOSE out from his sleeve. 
[138]Stay back! 
[139]I said stay back! 
[140]All I know is that neither of you deserves her. McCullen suddenly lifts the STEEL HOSE in his right hand-- --A BURST OF FLAME tears out at Duke who reflexively fires the PULSE PISTOL at it. The intense air blast from the pulse pistol catches the flames midway between them and blows them back onto McCullen. McCullen SCREAMS as his face is literally burned off. The Doctor freaks and drops the PDA, then yanks McCullen out into the corridor. Duke fires after them, then grabs the PDA, removing Ana's screen with a sigh of relief.     112. 
[141]There's nothing you can do? 
[142]I'll visit you. 
[143]You'll be here for the rest of your life, Ana. She looks at him, her face softening. 
[144]I'm here. 
[145]I'll visit you. And for a moment, she appears to crack... but then a sinister smile creases her mouth. 
[146]What do you say, Rip? Ripcord looks at Scarlett, who throws him a wink and a smile.
dialogues.RIPCORD:
[1]Not gonna explode, is it? 
[2]Why not stick it in a chopper and fly it out? If you want, I could-- 
[3]
[4]You know, I hate all the Mother Goose, bird Dog crap, I just wish they'd let us say, "Hey, Pete, it's Bill, see ya in a few." 
[5]Just saying, you know, if I ran things...     10. 
[6]But we'd be badasses, right Bro? 
[7]Hey Duke, ya know how they always tell you to empty your head of distracting thoughts on these runs? 
[8]And you know how people sometimes joke that it must be easy fr me to keep my mind empty? 
[9]Well, the second I try and make myself not have thoughts, I always have 'em. Like now, know what I'm thinking about? 
[10]The Air Forces. 
[11]You were done with it, not me. Look, I loev flying... Duke "mouths" the following sentence as Ropcord says it: 
[12]I've been flying since I was thirteen years old. Ripcord shoots him a look. Duke just smiles. 
[13]Jets, man, jets. You know I always qualify when I'm on leave. 
[14]We've done ten years in the Army, I just think we should see if the grass really is greener. 
[15]Funny. Real funny.     12. 
[16]It's always about you, isn't it? Give me one good reason? 
[17]Won't be saying that when you call in an air strike and I come screaming in to save your-- 
[18]Hey, on the training run weren't there herders around here? This puts Duke instantly on the alert. 
[19]Jesus Christ! Bird Down! 
[20]Yeah, except for all the blood. Duke sees blood on the back of Rip's head. Then they hear a LOUD ROAR and turn to see the Typhoon hover by the Grizzly. 
[21]Who the hell is that? Duke grabs Ripcord and starts dragging him out. 
[22]Duke? 
[23]If I die... 
[24]I just want you to know... you never could run worth a damn. 
[25]I'm just saying, it's be nice if you could move a little faster. And that's when the Cougar blows, a concussive blast. Ana turns with the weapons case in time to see Duke and Rip go ass-over-teacups down into a ditch. She touches the stem of her glasses which ZOOM IN on Duke. DOWN IN THE DITCH: Duke rolls over and looks at Rip. 
[26]Sure. 
[27]What's your unit? 
[28]Happy to turn this into a turkey shoot. Someone OFF-PROJECTOR hands Hawk a file, he looks at it. 
[29]Told ya. 
[30]Hey, you're cute. 
[31]What's your name, darlin'?     21. Snake-Eyes stabs Ripcord hard int he arm with a drip-needle, Rip angrily eyeballs him and stifles a scream. 
[32]We are tough ... . but also sensitive.  Whoa, that's some mucho primo stuff you gave me. Rip is high now, his eyes float up to Heavy Duty who stares back at him. Rip reaches out to touch his well-cropped hair. 
[33].and a kung-fu grip. 
[34]Are you kidding me? Duke wasn't born, he was Government-Issued! 
[35]Duke, Duke, don't you get it: they're super secret, they're Mission Impossible. This tape's gonna self-destruct in five-- 
[36]I want in too. That way we can spend some bunker time together. A SWORD suddenly slices across Rip's face, an inch away. It's Snake-Eyes, checking his blade, seemingly innocent. But the message is not lost on Ripcord. Scarlett looks at Duke. 
[37]We've been together forever.  But not like that. Hi, I'm Ripcord. 
[38]Okay, look, I didn't "steal" that Blackhawk, I was borrowing it... Duke shoots him a look. Hawk steps right up to Duke. 
[39]Four years? My man had some issues. Duke shoots him another look, then turns back to Hawk. 
[40]Oh man, I want one of those. 
[41]Both. Scarlett's eyes roll. They descend into the DESERT COMBAT level, where soldiers train with desert warfare equipment. 
[42]Who could possibly fund all this? 
[43]That's the reason we got our asses kicked. Duke betrays nothing. Hawk looks at him. 
[44]What's the other half? McCullen now appears next to Ripcord and walks through him. 
[45]Jesus! And we realize McCullen is here courtesy of a HOLO-PROJECTOR. A ring of cameras provides him with images of the Joes. 
[46]Hey, that's-- Duke cuts him off with a look. Breaker extracts a full 3D FRONT-VIEW of Ana's face from the photo. Then on an adjacent monitor, he runs an endless series of PHOTOS OF WOMEN. 
[47]You okay? 
[48]Let us in on this, General. Our team just got wasted. I think a little payback is in order. 
[49]My hot tub only holds four.  No, five.     40. 
[50]How was I supposed know she was married!?  Nice rock! Hey, are you proposing? 
[51]Not official until you answer my question. Do you love my boy? 
[52]Now I've gotta find someone to love me, as many times as possible for the next three hours. WE PUSH IN ON THE PHOTO, then SMASH CUT BACK TO THE PRESENT. 
[53]What's it accelerate? 
[54]I just missed everything you said.  How do I look? Pretty cool, huh? 
[55]Don't tell me, Snake-Eyes? 
[56]You can do this whole course with that thing in forty-five seconds? 
[57]When I want something, I don't just shoot at it...  When I get a target in my sights, I take it down. His meaning is clear. She holds his gaze, slaps a magazine into her CROSSBOW PISTOL and hands it to him. 
[58]I wouldn't want to show you up. 
[59]What can I tell you? I guess I'm just a considerate, humble guy. You'll learn that about me. 
[60]I don't want to hurt you. 
[61]What? You say something? Breaker sits at a chessboard. Heavy D sits across from him. 
[62]Heavy told me she graduated college at twelve. No response from Duke, who is trying to get comfortable. 
[63]She's like a freaky genius. A deadly, freaky genius. 
[64]You haven't kissed anyone? Now Scarlett looks really furious. Rip instantly wishes he could take his words back. Duke just shakes his head.     50. 
[65]Hell with it. He strides across the room toward Scarlett. Breaker notices. 
[66]Beach reading, huh? She groans and lowers the book only slightly. 
[67]Hi, I guess we kinda got off on the wrong foot... Without changing expression she goes back to her book. 
[68]Okay look, I'm attracted to you. And you, you're attracted to me. And him--  The Zen Master, he creeps me out, but what I'm saying is-- 
[69]Thank you. 
[70]Okay, what are you saying? 
[71]Okay, I'll get back to you on that. And he walks away scratching his head. Hawk steps in. Everyone comes to attention. 
[72]And you get out of that...thing. Stalemate. Storm Shadow doesn't move. Ana turns and looks at Duke. Sets the case down, her voice is gentle. 
[73]Don't listen to her, Duke.  Was I really going to be your best man? 
[74]Jesus, you okay? 
[75]You're not fine, let me look at that.     61. 
[76]Take it easy, just trying to help. 
[77]And what is that exactly? 
[78]You know, not every guy you meet is an asshole. You do know that, don't you? Scarlett stops and returns to the sink, he ignores her, cleaning the blood off his face. She softens. 
[79]Why not? 
[80]You almost died. You're allowed to be concerned. 
[81]Think he's be disappointed. 
[82]I don't know how you teach anybody to win at everything every time.      62. 
[83]But I do know you can teach someone to get up when they get knocked down. Ripcord turn her gently in the mirror. 
[84]Look at you. Still here. Maybe this is what he wanted you to learn. Scarlett stares at her reflection briefly. 
[85]But of course, that would be an emotional response, one that can't be explained or quantified. Ripcord turns and heads for the door. Scarlett watches him. 
[86]The weapons case! Everyone stops and looks at Ripcord like he's nuts. 
[87]Remember he had us open the case for him. Remember that?     64. 
[88]I'll bet that code he gave us like re-activated the tracking beacon or something. Looks pass among the group, it starts to make sense. 
[89]Wow, she traded up, huh?  I mean... financially. 
[90]I've gotta level with ya! 
[91]Gonna be a long five minutes. Duke just grits his teeth and keeps firing. Then, in the distance, RUMBLING coming from the sonic roar of JETS. 
[92]I love that sound... But then he looks to Duke, confusion on his face. 
[93]Blackhawk's waiting. Come on, we've got wounded! And incoming enemy! Lots of 'em! 
[94]Nothing you can do. Come on...! Gunfire bursts around them as Ripcord pulls Duke away from the ruins of the house.     68. 
[95]What about you? Don't you get a suit? Snake-Eyes just looks at him, "Are you kidding me?" 
[96]Millions of dollars, got it. He promptly trips and crashes to the pavement. Picks himself up. Gets hit by a car. Picks himself up again. 
[97]Sorry! Excusem moil  Won't happen again.     73. Then Rip hauls-ass after Duke. 
[98]There's no door! 
[99]Oh, man... Under the Scarab, Snake-Eyes pulls out his GLOCK PISTOL and fires into the unprotected insides of the FRONT TIRES, which promptly rip to shreds. The Neo-Viper loses control of the vehicle, SMASHES through a GUARD ARM onto train tracks. Snake-Eyes sees something, lets go, rolls free and crashes into garbage cans just as a METRO TRAIN barrels into the Scarab, which LAUNCHES into the air, hood-over-tailpipe. Duke and Ripcord are running too fast to stop. Duke manages to leap into the air, his boots barely scraping the top of the train while Ripcord covers his face with his hands and PLUNGES headlong into a window on the side of the train... 
[100]I went through the train. What happened to you? 
[101]You can do that? 
[102]How do you say "we're the good guys" in French? Meanwhile, Snake-Eyes evades all the chaos by leaping up under the south base, scaling the iron lattice like a monkey.     78. ON THE FIRST FLOOR: Ana and Storm Shadow crest the stairs and rudely push through the crowd to the stairway on the opposite side of the floor. Another SECURITY GUARD draws a gun on them but Storm Shadow snatches the weapon out of the man's hands, swatting him with the butt, all without missing a step. The crowd panics and runs screaming for the stairs-- --where Duke and Ripcord are struggling to catch up. The avalanche of tourists slows their progress. Underneath the stairway, however, Snake-Eyes continues to climb fast without a safety net. He makes it to the first floor and races after Ana and Storm Shadow. ON THE GROUND: The Brawler screeches up. Scarlett's first out with Breaker and Heavy Duty behind her. All of them carrying weapons. The Security Guards instantly go on the defensive as they hurry up to the stairway. Guns go up. Scarlett speaks to them urgently in French. 
[103]Where you going? 
[104]It's too late! We gotta get off this thing! 
[105]What are you doing? 
[106]Can you find Duke? 
[107]They're eating him! 
[108]You did the best you could. 
[109]You got it?  Well, what was the "NOO!" for?

Ana's got her dead-to-rights until Scarlett triggers her CAMO- SUIT, melting into nothing right in front of Ana. Ana doesn't spot the RIPPLES OF AIR around her until she's stuck hard. The case goes flying. Another SMACK and her pistol is knocked free. Ana grabs a second pistol, but that's just as quickly twisted out of her grasp and dropped. Ana fights the invisible Scarlett as best she can, but Scarlett lands several unseen blows on her. Ripcord and Duke take out a pair of Neo-Vipers. Storm Shadow climbs back into the Arclight. Looking at ana as she falls near a vehicle on the blocks. Ana grabs an OIL PAN and flings the oil, which sprays over everything, including Scarlett, making her visible. Ana leaps on Scarlett, knocks her to the ground and angrily begins to choke the life out of her. Storm Shadow ignites the Arclight which jumps into the air, powered by an arc of blue light shooting out of its engine pack. He quickly swoops towards the two women and grabs ana by her arm, pulling her along. Ana grabs the weapons case and they soar up out of the motor pool and over the landing pad. The battle raging below them. Ripcord and Duke fire after them, but they vanish up into the next level. Heavy Duty, now back in action, takes out the last of the Neo-Vipers. Snake-Eyes checks on Scarlett who's nursing her neck. 
[28]I'm fine.

[30]I know what you're trying to do.

[33]I don't know. All the people we lost last night. General Hawk... My neck is not that important.

Duke sees Snake-Eyes being pushed down the stairs by the tourists. He leaps up onto the iron lattice.

dialogues.MCCULLEN:
[1]Still using matchlocks, are ya? I can get you a pair of flintlocks, you let me sneak out of here. Everyone else in this sequence speaks with a French accent. 
[2]The best. From Spain. And perhaps a couple of pretty young ladies to teach you how to use them. Guard #1 is even more tempted, but his partner is a Loyalist. 
[3]Your King is a vile bag of filth who murders his own allies. I should've charged him double. 
[4]They offered me a Chancellorship, because unlike your simpleton King, they know that is the McCullen destiny, to run the wars, the true power, not simply to supply arms. 
[5]Yes, I do. Clan McCullen is far bigger and more powerful than any of you could ever imagine. My sons will continue to rise along after I am gone. As will their sons. And, God willing, their sons.  It shall not end with my death. The Warden smiles back sinisterly. 
[6]War used to be the exception. Now it is the new state of play, a constant, unavoidable... 
[7]Tragic as they are to fight, wars must be won. But perhaps they don't have to be as destructive as they've been in the past. A SERIES OF COMPLEX SCHEMATICS rolls continuously on a screen behind him. McCullen is briefing twenty-two NATO MILITARY COMMANDERS, many of them listening in TRANSLATION HEADPHONES. 
[8]Nano-mites. Perfect little soldiers. Their size can be programmed as well as their intended task. Originally developed to isolate and destroy cancer cells, but at Mars Industries, and with the help of a little NATO funding...     4. A few laughs around the room. McCullen soaks it up. 
[9].we discovered how to program them to eliminate most anything. For instance... metal. ON SCREEN: A SOLDIER fires a shoulder-launched missile at a tank. The warhead bursts into millions of SILVER MICROSCOPIC NANO-MITES which eat away the metal like piranhas devouring a horse. Then the NANO-MITES fan out from the consumed tank and quickly head for a nearby jeep. 
[10]Once the target has been destroyed, the launcher triggers a kill switch unique to each warhead that short- circuits the nano-mites, preventing any unwanted destruction. ON SCREEN: The Soldier hits a KILL SWITCH on the launcher and the NANO-MITES instantly "drop dead" around the nearby jeep. 
[11]Each warhead contains seven million nano-mites and has the ability to eat anything from a single tank to an entire city.  But without innocent casualties. Which is why this has been such a priority for me and my company. The room breaks into APPLAUSE. FOCUSES ON GENERAL HAWK, a British veteran or countless battles, not buying it. 
[12]I prefer the term "armament solutions engineer"  Gentlemen! I'm pleased to announce that tomorrow morning your first order of nanotech warheads will ship from my factory in Kyrgyzstan.     5. 
[13]I know who you are General hawk. As sharp in a briefing room as your reputation is on the battlefield.     7. 
[14]It's an honor to meet a man of your many accomplishments. McCullen smiles, then offers Hawk to walk with him. 
[15]What's on your mind, General? 
[16]Those "ears" all have top security clearance. 
[17]Look, General, delivery is my responsibility and it's not one I take lightly. I had NATO assign an elite American Special Forces unit, a fully armored convoy with air support. I assure you, my warheads will be quite safe. 
[18]This is no time to play catch up. The NATO team's been drilling for weeks. They're lit up and ready to roll. 
[19]Maybe next time, General...  What did you say your unit was called? 
[20]General, most men I've encountered in this business over-promise and under-deliver. You're the opposite. Clearly, you were the security option I should have chosen. ON DUKE: Steaming behind his military demeanor. 
[21]--But not you. 
[22]I've spent ten years and thirteen billion Euros creating these four warheads. Your job, Captain, was to protect them, and if it wasn't for General Hawk, you would've failed. 
[23]Well that wasn't enough. Duke bristles. McCullen turns to Hawk. 
[24]What are your coordinates? I'll have NATO send another special ops team to retrieve the warheads, company strength this time. 
[25]Are you sure you're not a McCullen? 
[26]You do just fine, General. Now, so the bastards who attacked you can't find you, you need to disable the tracking beacon hidden in the case. 
[27]Good man. So, can I count on you to deliver the warheads to NATO now? 
[28]Alright. But allow me to check the warheads to see if any have been damaged. Duke begrudgingly sets the case down. Breaker turns on his suit's BALL-EYEPIECE. It goes into X-RAY MODE and we see the NANO-MITES crawling around inside the four warheads. 
[29]Open it, please. 
[30]General? 
[31]Five-two-nine-four-four-oh. Breaker enters the code. As the case opens, Breaker discreetly watches McCullen in his BALL-EYEPIECE SCANNER. McCullen runs his holographic fingers over the warheads. Satisfied, he turns to Hawk. 
[32]Please keep me informed of your progress, General. Duke and McCullen share a quick glare. And then McCullen cuts the feed. Scarlett notices concern on Breaker's face. 
[33]I spend five years setting this up. Wringing money out of NATO. This was supposed to be the easy part. 
[34]And lost the trust of our clients in the process? It had to be NATO's fault.  What happened? Did you hesitate? 
[35]Forgive me, jealousy isn't my strong suit. 
[36]They deactivated the beacon. I gave them a code to quietly re-arm it. McCullen hits a key, a SCREEN switches on, displaying A MAP OF THE WORLD. A BEACON LIGHT flashes over a spot in the Egyptian desert, grip coordinates blinking. 
[37]There it is. The infamous Pit. 
[38]I hope so. 
[39]I'll send a jet. 
[40]Sometimes I really hate technology. He sighs heavily, then hears a VOICE: 
[41]There can't be any more mistakes. The schedule can't be compromised any further. 
[42]I'm sending you now, Storm Shadow. To the Baroness's villa. .Make sure her commitment doesn't waiver. Storm Shadow nods, McCullen continues on THROUGH him. We now realize Storm Shadow was a holo-proj. Storm Shadow vanishes.     31. McCullen steps up to a large oval perspex window. WE PULL BACK out of the window to reveal that he's riding through DEEP ARCTIC OCEAN inside a next-gen "TRIDENT" submarine. CAMERA KEEPS PULLING BACK to show the Trident approaching the docking bay of a MASSIVE FACILITY built into the seabed under the jagged canopy of the POLAR ICE CAP. The place is defended by several HARPOON CANNONS and a fearsome TURBO-LASER. It's a breath-taking sight, but also a little frightening. 
[43]Good to be back. 
[44]Is it working? 
[45]English, Doctor. The Doctor keys a demand and that particular Neo-Viper steps up and sticks his bare arm into the case through a portal. 
[46]--Doctor. 
[47]And they are completely obedient? 
[48]You've done well. You've thrown the caber clear out of the yard. 
[49]--I appreciate your thirst for knowledge, Doctor. But this world is messy enough. Factions fighting and scrabbling for control, for resources, and it's only going to get worse as the century progresses. No. What the world needs is unification. Leadership.      34. 
[50]It needs to be taken out of chaos by someone with complete control. He looks through a portal into a shadowy OPERATING CHAMBER, where a brilliant but vicious looking MAN is being scanned by SMART ROBOTS. This is ZARTAN. A Smart Robot begins to change Zartan's fingerprints, which we see on a monitor. 
[51]My family was once this close to that kind of power...  The French... Zartan CRACKS HIS KNUCKLES and gives McCullen a nod. McCullen looks back at the Doctor. 
[52]Once I get my hands on the reins, the money will take care of itself. You'll be able to do all the research you want. McCullen strides off. The Doctor stares after him. 
[53]Never get caught. McCullen carefully puts 
[54]I don't wan t you until leaving Paris that they've you;re sure that the weaponized.  We'll let CNN show everyone how w ell they perform.  I want them to fear me. It will be STORM SHADOWdone. 
[55]I have a target french will never in mind, one the forget.      58. 
[56]As I have never forgotten what the French did to Clan McCullen. 
[57]Gentlemen. About to get under way? Zartan raises his PDA. 
[58]Check your account. Zartan checks the PDA. McCullen shakes his head. 
[59]It's always about the money. 
[60]Destroy that unit immediately. The Doctor removes his PDA and taps a key to draw up the Neo- Viper's file. He clicks a button that reads "TERMINATE". 
[61]Take them to the drones. I want them ready to launch in one hour. 
[62]My beautiful Lady of the Lake... He kisses her. Ana kisses him back with slightly-feigned affection, her eyes open and on Duke. Duke stands there, impassive. McCullen finishes the kiss and turns to Duke. 
[63]This bother you? Duke says nothing, so McCullen steps closer. 
[64]Isn't it funny, with the entire balance of power in the world about to shift, a couple of guys can still have a stare down over who gets the girl. Duke takes the opportunity to HEAD BUTT McCullen. The Neo- Vipers instantly pummel Duke to the floor. McCullen wipes a small trickle of blood from his nose.     91. 
[65]The interesting thing about my Neo- Vipers is they still think the same thoughts they always did, they just can't act on them anymore. Instead, they do what I want. I imagine that must be very frustrating. He gets right down in Duke's face. 
[66]I'm going to make you very unhappy. 
[67]You take to your training well, that's good. Still trying to develop information. Still planning to escape and stope me. Moments from now, you'll see that won't ever happen. 
[68]Isn't it clear? I'm a business man. I'm going to use them. 
[69]Merely to strike fear into the hearts of every man, woman, and child on the planet. Only then will they look up to the man who wields the most power, and obey him. 
[70]Meet the genius behind all my nanotechnology. 
[71]You'll have to excuse his modesty, when I found him, he was -- 
[72]Albeit a rather unwilling one. The Doctor's nano-mites can control all manner of brain functions. When you wake up, you'll be working for me, and your past will be a distant shimmer that floats in and out of your mind like a leaf on a breeze. 
[73]Good, commence the launch sequence immediately. is that a ripple of concern flickering across Ana's face? 
[74]Lost one? What do you mean? 
[75]Alert all defences. Charge up the pulse cannon. He turns to say something to Ana, but she has left the room. 
[76]Is she still alive? 
[77]You said this couldn't happen.     105. 
[78]Did you think she loved you? 
[79]Did you imagine your life with her? 
[80]I guess I should thank you, Doctor. The Doctor is busy fiddling with his hand held PDA. 
[81]Yes, Commander.
dialogues.ANA:
[1]Hello, Duke... Then she round house kicks him with her boot across the face, knocks him out on his ass. 
[2]You have to admit you had that coming. Ana struggles with something going on inside her head. Then her face reluctantly hardens and she takes her hand off the first Viper's gun barrel, giving Duke an apologetic look. 
[3]Good-bye, Duke. Duke can't believe it. Ana suddenly glances up at something behind Duke. It's a "HOWLER" TRANSPORT rocketing onto the scene, its four-winged JET THRUSTERS rotating ninety degrees to slow it into a hover. [7]I will get those warheads back.     30. McCullen steps forward and lovingly caresses her face, his hand going right through her. McCullen whispers menacingly.

[12]Of course.     38.

[14]Most husbands would be. 
[15]They think they know. 
[16]I never get over how beautiful... 
[17]Let me change and freshen up and I'll meet you for dinner. 
[18]He's my husband, of course he touches me. Tell McCullen to grow up. Besides, the Baron says his work in the lab goes much better after we've... touched. And that's the important thing. 
[19]The Doctor. 
[20]Duke...it's beautiful. It's too nice you lunatic. 
[21]Time already? 
[22]Is it WMDs? It is, right? That's why you're pulling Rex out of the 
[23]Yeah, yeah. Classified. Top Secret. Have to kill me if you told me, blah, blah, blah. 
[24]Yes. Of course it's yes. On one

[26]I already said yes. 
[27]Always and forever. Ripcord flips open his CELL PHONE and takes the photo of Ana that Duke carries with him. 
[28]The foundation of this fence is a hundred feet deep. No going under. Ten Neo-Viper mole pods start to burst out the wall. And then there's a crashing sound as one of the wall girders bends, obviously a mole machine in the clay behind it hit it. Ana can hear the engine grind to a halt. 
[29]If we don't get him out he'll suffocate. Storm Shadow gives her a look: Like I care? 
[30]Just thought I'd mention it.

Inside the accelerator, the four warheads begin to spin in a GLASS VACUUM CHAMBER -- then, as the power grows, they begin to rise, each one hovering as they spin. Ana and Storm Shadow watch with mild curiosity as the noise inside the chamber builds. The atoms catapulting faster and faster through the tunnels, bombarding the warheads again and again. Until finally, a LOUD BOOM rings out. And the warheads slowly sink back down and stop spinning. DeCobray keys another button and the GLASS VACUUM CHAMBER emerges from the accelerator.     71. Technicians open the chamber and very carefully remove the warheads, returning them to their case. Storm Shadow locks the case and picks it up.

She feels Storm Shadow watching her and with a flick of her eyes, the walls go up again. She drop a SEALED ENVELOPE on DeCobray's desk and heads for the door.
